ygData.subject: Re: Grouping
ygData.msgSnippet: In beta I heard of a group of level 20-24 bards that had a grand old time in runneye. The best I have ever managed is to group with one other bard.  It was
ygData.messageBody:
In beta I heard of a group of level 20-24 bards that had a grand old time in
runneye. The best I have ever managed is to group with one other bard. It
was great, one person in charge of buffing and another debuffing, plus all
the twisting it was pretty effective.

Rokenn Swiftsong
Master Brewer
Karana Server

> How effective would it be to have a group of 20+ level bards all
